newHaven.title: New Haven
newHaven.html:
Walled market town with cobblestone streets and a lively marketplace.

  • Inn: The Silver Tinker
  • Blacksmith: The Anvil & Ember

blackthornRuins.title: Blackthorn Ruins
blackthornRuins.html: Ancient amphitheater crumbling above the cliffs. Locals avoid it after dark.

pebbleBay.title: Pebble Bay
pebbleBay.html: Beautiful inlet bay with sandy shores on the south side of the island. Pebble Bay is the end of the river that connects to Lake Flourn

lakeFlorn.title: Lake Florn
lakeFlorn.html: At the base of the Blackthorn Mountains, surrounded by dark forest on the east and west, Lake Florn is the center of Thornreach. It home to many magical creatures.
